conbody.p: A conditional enables a page or module to be displayed differently depending on the context. For example, if the party is a physical person, then certain fields needs to be displayed; whereas, if the party is a corporation, other fields need to be displayed. The actual logic that determines which condition is displayed in the running application needs to be provided by an IT consultant.
When a conditional is first created, it includes two conditions because the second condition is the default condition. If no default condition applies, it can be deleted.
Conditional widgets can be nested within other conditional widgets.
